thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location!
thread.title_full: Location! - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Belle W
title: Location!
text: Well, all IHG hotels are expected to be really good. I say this one is good enough. Perfect location (if you really want to stay in the heart of Times Square). Comfy beds and pillows. Spacious rooms. The only thing I didn't like is that there's no fridge. Also, you still need to call if you like slippers, toothbrush and water.
